trans-unit.source: Contains contextual state information for a designer, such as the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Contiene la información de estado contextual de un diseñador, como por ejemplo, <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: This includes permanent state information, such as the list of services running in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Esto incluye la información de estado permanente, como la lista de servicios que se ejecutan en el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: It also includes transient state consisting of context items including the set of currently selected objects as well as the editing tool being used to manipulate objects on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: También incluye el estado transitorio compuesto de los elementos de contexto, que incluyen el conjunto de objetos seleccionados actualmente, así como la herramienta de edición utilizada para manipular objetos en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> represents the communication boundary that is shared between the hosting application and the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: El objeto <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> representa el límite de comunicación que se comparte entre la aplicación de hospedaje y [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> was implemented as a concrete class for ease of use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> se implementó como una clase concreta para mayor facilidad de uso.

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A> to use customized managers derived from <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>.
trans-unit.target: Invalide los métodos <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A> y <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A> para utilizar administradores personalizados derivados de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> y <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the context item manager that is returned by the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia del administrador de elementos de contexto que devuelve la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Activites.Design.ContextItemManager" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activites.Design.ContextItemManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> that supports delayed activation of design editor managers through the declaration of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> attribute on the design editor manager.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada crea un objeto <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> que admite la activación retrasada de administradores de editores de diseño mediante la declaración de un atributo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> en el administrador de editores de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the service manager to be returned from the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia del administrador de servicios que se va a devolver desde la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> that supports delayed activation of design editor managers through the declaration of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> attribute on the design editor manager.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada crea un objeto <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> que admite la activación retrasada de administradores de editores de diseño mediante la declaración de un atributo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> en el administrador de editores de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Immediately releases any unmanaged resources used by the object.
trans-unit.target: Inmediatamente libera los recursos no administrados utilizados por el objeto.

trans-unit.source: Immediately releases any unmanaged resources used by the object.
trans-unit.target: Inmediatamente libera los recursos no administrados utilizados por el objeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object is being disposed of; <see langword="false" /> if the object is finalizing.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se va a desechar el objeto; es <see langword="false" /> si el objeto se va a finalizar.

trans-unit.source: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by the current <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera inmediatamente los recursos no administrados utilizados por el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method is called or when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se llama al método <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> o cuando finaliza el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> y recopila el recolector de elementos no utilizados de Common Language Runtime de Microsoft .NET.

trans-unit.source: Returns the local collection of context items stored by the current editing context.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la colección local de elementos de contexto almacenada por el contexto de edición actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager" /> collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem" /> objects used in this editing context.
trans-unit.target: La colección <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager" /> de los objetos <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem" /> que se usan en este contexto de edición.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A> collection is for data that is shared between a host and the designer.
trans-unit.target: La colección <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A> es para los datos que se comparten entre un host y el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: This data provides the mechanism needed to hook into subscription and change notification.
trans-unit.target: Estos datos proporcionan el mecanismo necesario para conectar con la suscripción y la notificación de cambios.

trans-unit.source: Returns the service manager used in the current editing context.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el administrador de servicios utilizado en el contexto de edición actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager" /> used in this editing context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager" /> utilizado en este contexto de edición.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services%2A> represent functionality that is either provided by the host for the designer to use or that is used by the designer to make functionality available to all designers within the editor.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services%2A> representa la funcionalidad que proporciona el host para que la use el diseñador o que usa el diseñador para poner la funcionalidad a disposición de todos los diseñadores del editor.
